## ITerminal interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ITerminal 
```

## Methods

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[registerProvider(provider)](./terminal.iterminal.registerprovider.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Subscribe a new terminal provider.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unregisterProvider(provider)](./terminal.iterminal.unregisterprovider.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Unsubscribe a terminal provider. If the provider isn't subscribed, this function does nothing.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[write(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.write.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a generic message to the terminal


</td></tr>

[writeDebug(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writedebug.md)

**_(BETA)_** Write a debug-level message.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeDebugLine(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writedebugline.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a debug-level message followed by a newline.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeError(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writeerror.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write an error message to the console with red text.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeErrorLine(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writeerrorline.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write an error message to the console with red text, followed by a newline.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeLine(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writeline.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a generic message to the terminal, followed by a newline


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeVerbose(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writeverbose.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a verbose-level message.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeVerboseLine(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writeverboseline.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a verbose-level message followed by a newline.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeWarning(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writewarning.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a warning message to the console with yellow text.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[writeWarningLine(messageParts)](./terminal.iterminal.writewarningline.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Write a warning message to the console with yellow text, followed by a newline.


</td></tr>
